column4: anyone here know any simple cron command that i can use to test out cron service ?
anyone here know any simple cron command that i can use to test out cron service ?
mkdir creates a directory, and touch creates a blank file.
if you set crontab to mkdir /home/usermanager/test, it should create "test" directory in your home folder
it would just be a simple way to see if crontab is working :P
